title: ChatGPT (GPT-4o) vs Segment Anything Model (SAM): Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare ChatGPT (GPT-4o) vs Segment Anything Model (SAM). See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between ChatGPT (GPT-4o) and Segment Anything Model (SAM)? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: ChatGPT (GPT-4o) vs Segment Anything Model (SAM)
paragraphs: ChatGPT (GPT-4o) (nlp) is Advanced large language model offering state-of-the-art natural language understanding and generation capabilities.. It's known for AI, NLP, OpenAI.

Segment Anything Model (SAM) (computer vision) is Meta's revolutionary promptable image segmentation model with zero-shot generalization capabilities.. Users choose it for Meta, Segmentation, Zero-shot.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: ChatGPT (GPT-4o): Advanced reasoning, Multimodal capabilities, Code understanding
Segment Anything Model (SAM): Zero-shot segmentation, Promptable interface, 1.1B mask dataset

verdict: Both ChatGPT (GPT-4o) and Segment Anything Model (SAM) are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: ChatGPT (GPT-4o) for AI, Segment Anything Model (SAM) for Meta.
